thread.title: Dozens of hiring tech companies to attend Vermont Tech Jam
thread.title_full: Dozens of hiring tech companies to attend Vermont Tech Jam - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Dozens of hiring tech companies to attend Vermont Tech Jam
text:
SOUTH BURLINGTON, Vt. (AP) - Dozens of local technology companies looking to fill jobs will be at the Vermont Tech Jam in South Burlington this Friday and Saturday.
The free job fair and tech expo takes place at the Sheraton Hotel and Conference Center.
The event includes more than 60 exhibitors and a number of Vermont colleges and training programs.
The Tech Jam is presented by the companies Dealer.com and MyWebGrocer and organized by Seven Days weekly newspaper.
